name: Gingerbread "Crackle" Cookies
description: Get ready for holiday cookie exchanges with these delightful cookies! Watch as they bake, spreading and breaking into an elegant crackle pattern.
preparation: Whisk flour, baking soda, spices and salt in a mixing bowl and set aside.
In a second bowl, cream butter with brown sugar and 1⁄2 cup white sugar.
Stir in egg, molasses and vanilla extract.
Gradually add dry ingredients, beating well after each addition.
Place remaining white sugar in a shallow bowl. Form cookies by rolling into 1” balls; roll in sugar and place 2” apart on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
Bake for 10 min, or until cookies ‘crackle’ on top. Cool before storing.
tips: Create a beautiful gift by rolling a stack of baked cookies in a half-sheet of parchment paper. Tie each end with a red ribbon and attach a gift card or recipe.
